word: WITH W.C.W. AND WIFE AND ELLA AND MABEL, WENT TO COORANBONG JULY 1, FOR REST. SPOKE SABBATH JULY 6 AND 13.  BOUGHT 40 ACRES FROM THE SCHOOL AND PLANNED TO MAKE HER HOME THERE.  RETURNED TO GRANVILLE IN MID-JULY, BUT WAS BACK IN COORANBONG DURING MOST OF AUGUST, LIVING IN TENT, SUPERVISING PLANTING OF HER ORCHARD, AND GETTING HER NEW HOME STARTED.
